name: LOT Polish Airlines 737-45D [SP-LLG] Taxi and Takeoff from Krakow ᴴᴰ
description:
Hey everyone, here we have my first spotting video from my vacation, at Krakow-Balice International Airport! I was pleasantly surprised to see this bird waiting to take off as soon as I got to this spot, since I've never seen LOT's 737-400 before. Plus, 734s are pretty rare to see in scheduled service nowadays, so that was an added bonus. Sorry for all the shakiness, I couldn't bring my tripod (for obvious reasons). I did gain a fair bit of freehand filming experience, however. Hope you enjoy, and don't forget to vote for my next video!

Thanks for watching! Please comment, rate, and subscribe!
____________________________________________________

FLIGHT INFO
Airline: LOT Polish Airlines (LOT/LO)
Aircraft: Boeing 737-400
Aircraft Name: None
Engines: 2x CFMI CFM56-3C1
Registration: SP-LLG
Route: KRK-WAW
Callsign: LOT ????
Runway used: 25
Taxiway(s) used: A, C, RW07/25 (Aircraft had to backtrack the runway that day due to construction on the normal taxiway used for takeoffs)
FlightAware: http://flightaware.com/live/flight/SPLLG
